zh_TW.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
您的授權代號並不存在。

請確認您所填寫的郵件網址是完整的。
zh_TW.auth.forgot.email_help: 請輸入您帳戶的電郵地址，我們將會把登入認證碼發給您。
zh_TW.auth.forgot.heading: 領取登入認證碼
zh_TW.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: 咦，該電郵地址並不在我們的資料庫内。或許您還未註冊?
zh_TW.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: 我們已經把認證碼寄給您說輸入的電郵地址。
zh_TW.auth.join.almost.body_html:
在您登入GameJolt之前，您必須確認您戶口的電郵地址。

我們已經把開啟帳戶的指示發送到您的電郵地址了。
zh_TW.You found a secret! But upon further ins: 你發現了一個祕密！但進一步檢查後，你發現這只是一個空空的頁面。
zh_TW.And really warm feelings for supporting: 以及支持一位獨立開發者的真正熱烈感情！
zh_TW.Because of international tax laws, we ar: 因為國際稅法的關係，我們需要收集這些資訊。
zh_TW.Before you can start selling your games,: 在您可以開始銷售您的遊戲之前，我們需要再跟您取得一些細節。這將確保您的帳號已經完全備妥，並準備在 Game Jolt 市集中順暢運作。
zh_TW.Bonaire, Saint Eustatius and Saba: 博內爾島、聖佑達修斯與薩巴
zh_TW.Bosnia and Herzegovina: 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那
zh_TW.Completely free with no option to pay at: 完全免費並且沒有任何付費選項。
zh_TW.For purchases made by Game Jolt members,: 對於那些由 Game Jolt 會員成立的購買項目，您的遊戲將會自動出現在他們的遊戲庫中。
zh_TW.Games Owned by {{ user }}: 遊戲已由 {{ user }} 擁有
您會在某人購買您的遊戲時收到郵件。
zh_TW.Heard Island and McDonald Islands: 赫德島和麥當唐納群島
zh_TW.Make this package the primary package: 把這個套件指定成主要套件
zh_TW.No games match your filters. <b>Zoinks!<: 沒有遊戲符合你的篩選!
zh_TW.Processing order. Gonna be rad!: 正在處理訂單。一定超讚的！
zh_TW.Saint Kitts and Nevis: 聖克里斯多福及尼維斯
zh_TW.Show {{ developer }} some <span class=\": 透過支持 {{ developer }} 來給他們一些  。
zh_TW.South Georgia and the South Sandwich Isl: 南喬治亞與南桑威奇群島
zh_TW.The developer has set the price of this: 開發者將這個遊戲的價格指定成 {{ amount }} ，但您可以支付更多來支援開發者。
zh_TW.The max you can set this to is {{ max }}: 你最高可將其設為{{ max }}美元
zh_TW.There was a problem processing your paym: 在處理您的交易時發生了問題。
zh_TW.These are all the games owned by {{ user: 這些都是 {{user}} 擁有的遊戲。
這些是你所擁有的全部遊戲
zh_TW.They will be able to pay $0 or more. The: 他們將能夠支付 $0 或更多。由他們設定價格。
zh_TW.This developer suggests paying <strong>{: 這位開發者建議支付 {{ amount }} ，但您可以自己決定要付多少。
這份訂單已在 {{ date }} 退款。
zh_TW.We are required to collect taxes on orde: 我們需要在某些地區的訂單中收取稅金。
zh_TW.We use the primary package to determine: 我們使用主要套件來決定要顯示在遊戲列表上的價格。
我們使用主要套件來決定要顯示在遊戲列表上的價格。您的遊戲只能有一個主要套件。
zh_TW.You can link a different PayPal account: 您可以在 付款設定 中連結不同的 PayPal 帳號。
zh_TW.You can now support your favorite indie: 您現在可以透過直接購買您最愛的開發者的遊戲來支援他們！
zh_TW.You can use our Sale Widget to sell game: 您可以使用我們的「銷售小工具」在您的網站中直接販賣遊戲！
zh_TW.You decide what percentage of your sale: 由您決定要將多少百分比的銷售收入交給 Game Jolt 。我們不會讓您給我們超過 10%，因為我們較希望您能透過購買其他開發者的遊戲來支援他們。
zh_TW.You do not have enough funds in your Wal: 您錢包中的餘額不足以用於這份訂單。
zh_TW.You don't own any games yet. Go buy some: 你尚未擁有任何遊戲 去買一些吧!
zh_TW.You have pending withdrawals amounting t: 您的待退款總額度為 {{ ::overviewCtrl.revenuePendingWithdraw | currency:'$' }} 。
zh_TW.You haven't bought any games on the site: 您還沒有在本站購買任何遊戲。當您購買了之後，您可以看到所有訂單以及每個交易明細。
zh_TW.You must <a href=\"{{ url }}\">set up yo: 您必須在可以開始接受金額之前 設定您的財務資訊 。
zh_TW.Your account is ready to sell games on G: 您的帳號已可準備在 Game Jolt 銷售遊戲！您可以在下面設定附加的選項。
zh_TW.Your Wallet is where your earnings will: 您的錢包是用來儲存您的金額，好讓您能夠在 Game Jolt 購買遊戲，或者讓您退費至您的 PayPal 帳號。
zh_TW.Comments have been disabled for this gam: 這款遊戲的評論功能已被取消
zh_TW.There are multiple packages for your dev: 有數個套件可用於您的裝置。請在下方選擇一個。
zh_TW.Warm thanks from both {{ developer }} an: 來自 {{ developer }} 以及 Game Jolt 團隊的熱烈感謝。
zh_TW.Anyone can access the game through the k: 任何人都可以存取金鑰頁面，直到金鑰被一名 Game Jolt 使用者領取為止。適用於點擊顯示金鑰、組合包、或者任何時候您需要以匿名的方式給出金鑰，並且看哪一個已經被領取。
zh_TW.Channels are like mini Game Jolts. Find: 頻道就像是個迷你的 Game Jolt 們。從特定的興趣尋找和發掘遊戲。
因為某些原因無法移除金鑰。
zh_TW.Could not remove key group for some reas: 因為某些原因無法移除金鑰群組。
zh_TW.Curious where your favorite YouTubers ge: 你对你最喜欢的Youtube用户从哪里得到他们的恐怖游戏好奇吗？在这里。最大的恐怖游戏采集在这里。看看吧！恐惧吧！
zh_TW.Five Nights at Freddy's Fangames: 《玩具熊的五夜后宫》自制游戏
zh_TW.Game can only be accessed once the key i: 遊戲只能夠被一名 Game Jolt 使用者透過金鑰存取並一次性的領取。適用於以金鑰做為贈品的場合，當您只想要讓一個人以一組金鑰領取您的遊戲，但您並不在乎是誰領取的。
zh_TW.It could contain content you may not wan: 此含有一些你不希望觀看的內容
zh_TW.Label: 標籤
zh_TW.Manage Key Groups for {{ game }}: 管理 {{ game }} 的金鑰群組
zh_TW.Manage your game keys and give access to: 管理您的遊戲金鑰並給使用者存取。
zh_TW.Only the Game Jolt users you specify wil: 只有您指定的 Game Jolt 使用者可以存取並領取您的遊戲。適用於測試員、朋友等。
zh_TW.Paste one email address per line, or sep: 在每一行貼上一組電子郵件地址，或者用逗號隔開它們。
zh_TW.Paste one username per line, or separate: 在每一行貼上一組使用者名稱，或者用逗號隔開它們。
zh_TW.This game is tagged for mature audiences: 這個遊戲被標記為適合成年玩家。
zh_TW.This setting will apply to this browser/: 這個設定只會套用至這個瀏覽器/裝置。
zh_TW.This will block games that have a maturi: 這將會封鎖那些成熟度分級為「成人」的遊戲，並且會先詢問您是否要繼續瀏覽完整的頁面。
zh_TW.We have updated our <a href=\"/terms\">T: 我們已於 2016 年 6 月 8 日更新了我們的 服務使用條款 及 隱私權政策。繼續使用 Game Jolt 則表示您已經同意新的條款。
zh_TW.You can only have a max of {{ 20000 | nu: 一個金鑰群組最多只能有 {{ 20000 | number }} 組的金鑰。
zh_TW.You've been manually approved for the Ma: 您已被手動核准可使用市集。
zh_TW.Accepting payments for fangames is illeg: 接受粉絲向遊戲的交易是違法的，並且違反了我們的使用條款。如果您販售粉絲向遊戲，我們將會移除您的帳號並將您從市集封鎖。
任何人都能存取這個套件。
zh_TW.Are you you want to unlink this channel?: 您確定要解除連結這個頻道？任何您在這個頻道完成的影片將會從 Game Jolt 移除。
zh_TW.Note that regardless of this setting, yo: 注意，不管這個設定如何，如果有已發佈的發行版本，您的套件都只會在您的遊戲頁面中可見。
zh_TW.Only you can access this package, as wel: 只有您可以存取這個套件，以及您分配的任何金鑰。您可以在 金鑰/存取 頁面分配金鑰。
zh_TW.This package will only be available to y: 這個套件只對您以及任何有存取權的金鑰開放。
zh_TW.We don't show ads on Marketplace game pa: 我們不會在市集的遊戲頁面顯示廣告 (即使是自行決定想付多少的遊戲)。
zh_TW.You can link your YouTube channels in or: 您可以連結您的 YouTube 頻道來張貼影片評論到遊戲中。
zh_TW.You can decide to have no minimum by set: 您可以決定把這設定成 $0 表示沒有最小值。
zh_TW.Check your Internet connection and try a: 檢查您的網路連線並且再試一遍。
無法建立新的發行版本。
zh_TW.Could not set the platform for some reas: 因為某些原因無法設定平台。
zh_TW.This allows you to disable right mouse c: 這允許您停用滑鼠右鍵點擊動作。只有當您的遊戲需要擷取右鍵時才啟用。
了解更多有關資料儲存
您的遊戲細節已經儲存。
zh_TW.Which engine, language, or tool?: 哪一個引擎,語言,創作工具?
zh_TW.Other Engine/Language/Tool: 其他引擎/語言/創作工具
zh_TW.This helps us create better filtering op: 這能協助我們透過了解大家使用了哪些工具來建立更好的過濾選項。
選擇一個引擎,語言,創作工具
zh_TW.References to or images of alcoholic bev: References to or images of alcoholic beverages.
zh_TW.Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilati: Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilation of body parts.
zh_TW.Depictions of cartoon-like characters in: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in unsafe situations.
Depictions of cartoon-like characters in aggressive conflict.
zh_TW.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving cartoon-like characters.
zh_TW.References to or images of illicit drugs: References to or images of illicit drugs.
zh_TW.Depictions of characters in unsafe situa: Depictions of characters in unsafe situations easily distinguishable from real life.
zh_TW.Depictions of characters in aggressive c: Depictions of characters in aggressive conflict easily distinguishable from real life.
zh_TW.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving situations easily distinguishable from real life.
Players can gamble using real money.
zh_TW.Depictions of or dialog including slapst: Depictions of or dialog including slapstick humor.
zh_TW.Depictions of or dialog including vulgar: Depictions of or dialog including vulgar humor; bathroom humor.
zh_TW.Depictions of or dialog including mature: Depictions of or dialog including mature humor; sexual humor.
Mild or infrequent use of profanity.
Strong or frequent use of profanity.
zh_TW.Brief depictions of nudity or artistic n: Brief depictions of nudity or artistic nudity.
zh_TW.Mild depictions of realistic characters: Mild depictions of realistic characters in unsafe situations.
zh_TW.Depictions of realistic characters in ag: Depictions of realistic characters in aggressive conflict.
zh_TW.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving realistic characters.
zh_TW.Your game's maturity information has bee: Your game's maturity information has been updated.
zh_TW.Provocative references or depictions of: Provocative references or depictions of provocative behavior.
zh_TW.Sexual references or depictions of sexua: Sexual references or depictions of sexual behavior.
zh_TW.Depictions of or graphic references to r: Depictions of or graphic references to rape or other violent sexual behavior.
zh_TW.References to or images of tobacco produ: References to or images of tobacco products.
了解更多有關截圖/圖片
zh_TW.This caption will appear when your image: 這文體會在圖片全屏觀看時出現。

zh_TW.Title: 標題
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to remove this son: 你確定要移除此首音樂?
管理您的遊戲的新聞更新。
zh_TW.You've published your game to the site!: You've published your game to the site! Huzzah! Remember to spread the word...
zh_TW.This release is published and can be acc: 這版本已被推出并可從專頁上獲得。
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to remove this bui: 您確定要移除這個建置版本？
zh_TW.The build has been removed from the rele: 已從發行版本中移除建置版本。
zh_TW.Learn more about choosing a good version: 了解更多關於選擇一個好的版本編號
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to publish this re: 您確定要發佈這個發行版本？它所屬的全部建置版本將會在您的遊戲頁面中變成可以使用。
zh_TW.The release is now active on your game p: The release is now active on your game page.
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to remove this rel: Are you sure you want to remove this release? All of its builds will be removed as well.
zh_TW.The release and its builds have been rem: The release and its builds have been removed from the package.
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to hide this relea: Are you sure you want to hide this release? It will no longer be accessible from your game page.
zh_TW.The release has been unpublished and is: The release has been unpublished and is now hidden.
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to permanently rem: 確定要永久移除此遊戲?
zh_TW.Your game has been removed from the site: 您的遊戲已經從網站中移除了。也許有一天，鳳凰會找到屬於他的歸宿。
zh_TW.Scores with lower values are ranked bett: 分數值較低的被排列得比較高
zh_TW.Scores with higher values are ranked bet: 較佳的得分數會有較高的排名
zh_TW.Name: 名稱
zh_TW.Scores with lower values are ranked bett: Scores with lower values are ranked better/higher.
zh_TW.Scores with higher values are ranked bet: Scores with higher values are ranked better/higher.
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to remove this sco: 您確定要移除此得分數?
您的遊戲設定已經儲存。
zh_TW.What are the thumbnail requirements and: 什麼是縮圖需求？有沒有相關準則？
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to clear this trop: 您確定要清除這個獎盃圖片？
了解更多關於獎盃圖片…
zh_TW.Secret trophies hide everything but thei: 在玩家取得前只會顯示名稱的秘密獎盃
zh_TW.Trophies that are hidden will only appea: Trophies that are hidden will only appear on the site for you, the developer, for testing purposes.
zh_TW.Making a trophy secret hides everything: Making a trophy secret hides everything but its name until it is achieved.
zh_TW.Game does not belong to this developer: 遊戲不屬於這位開發者
zh_TW.There are no scores on this scoreboard y: 這個得分榜尚未獲得任何得分
這個遊戲還沒有任何獎盃。告訴遊戲開發者叫他新增一些！
zh_TW.Get notifications when people post new r: 在有人張貼新回覆到這個討論串時接收通知。
zh_TW.Incorrect maturity rating for the conten: 對於遊戲的內容來說是不正確的成熟度分級。
zh_TW.It is hate speech or contains graphic co: 這是仇恨的言論或影像內容
zh_TW.It is pornographic or contains sexually: 這是色情或包含骨露的內容
zh_TW.It is spam or unwanted commercial conten: 這是垃圾訊息或不必要的商業內容
zh_TW.Follow this playlist to add it to your l: Follow this playlist to add it to your library and be notified when new games are added.
zh_TW.Unfollow this playlist to remove it from: Unfollow this playlist to remove it from your library and stop receiving notifications.
zh_TW.Uh-oh, something has prevented you from: 哎唷喂，某個東西阻止您解除追蹤這個遊戲，
zh_TW.Are you sure you want to remove this gam: 你確定要把這遊戲從你的清單中移除？
zh_TW.No information on game page (no screensh: 在遊戲頁面沒有任何訊息 (沒有螢幕截圖、零散的描述、預留頁面…等)
還沒有發布任何發行版本。
zh_TW.Oh no! We couldn't download this package: 噢不！我們無法下載這個套件，也許該檢查您是否還在線上？
zh_TW.Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package a: 噢不！我們下載之後無法解開這個套件。也許再試一次看看？
%{ count } 個人喜歡這則留言。
zh_TW.Profile or username contains explicit or: 個人檔案或用戶名稱包含明示或敏感字眼
發送者將不會收到通知。
在下面輸入您的搜尋指令。
No results for that search query.
zh_TW.Start when Windows starts?: 在 Windows 啟動時執行？
zh_TW.This is the directory on your computer t: 遊戲將會安裝到您電腦中的這個目錄。
zh_TW.An extraction is when the game is unpack: An extraction is when the game is unpacked and installed after downloading.
zh_TW.If you have more than this number, downl: If you have more than this number, downloads will be queued up.
zh_TW.If you have more than this number, extra: If you have more than this number, extractions will be queued up.
zh_TW.Describe what this system report is abou: 說明這個系統報告是關於哪方面的問題，像是你可能遇到的任何錯誤，以及您如何重現它。
您的系統報告已經送出。
zh_TW.Thanks for helping us make Game Jolt a p: 感謝您幫助我們讓 Game Jolt 成為適合所有人的地方。我們會盡快檢閱您的訊息！
zh_TW.There's been an error, and it's of the d: 出現了一個錯誤，而且還是很詭異的那種。
zh_TW.This build has more info to fill in befo: This build has more info to fill in before it will be available in this release.
zh_TW.This build is not launchable on certain: This build is not launchable on certain platforms. They've been disabled below.
zh_TW.This package can not be installed on you: This package can not be installed on your system, but can be quick played in the client.
This package can not be installed on your system.
zh_TW.The amount of EXP gained from this troph: The amount of EXP gained from this trophy.
zh_TW.Upload Downloadable Build: 上傳可下載的建置版本
zh_TW.We are having trouble connecting to Game: 我們連線到 Game Jolt 時發生了問題。
zh_TW.You and another person like this comment: 您以及另外一個人都喜歡這則留言。
You are currently running this package. Some options have been disabled while it's open.
zh_TW.You don't have any builds in this releas: You don't have any builds in this release yet. You won't be able to publish until you put some in.
